title: Please Adivce the font - Art Deco Sans style
content:
Hello,

Can anyone advice the font in the logo, I have been through many of them but unable to distinguished between 2 or 3 similar ones.

Please advice the font with your abilities of matching.

the word " tangled " only.

Thanks  
Regards,  
Hasnain Munawar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Tangled_4258.jpg)
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
I think this could be customized [House Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133546/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet). If you mix the various 'years' you can find the right letterforms. Cut out pieces from the 'a' and 'e' and you have it.

- Mike Yanega

Chalet is a good candidate for customization. It is also deeply rooted in [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133546/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bauhaus) (or [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701133546/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/pump)). To me, it's either a freebie or a complete custom job based on the same /o shape (mainly no optical correction):  
- /t = /o half bottom + 2 strokes  
- /a = cut /o + 1 stroke  
- /n = /o half top + 2 strokes  
- /g = /o + (/o half bottom + 1 stroke)  
- /e = cut /o + 1 stroke  
- /d = /o + 1 stroke
